title: A Growing Contingent of NBA Players Is Wondering If the League Should Return at All | The Mismatch
description:
A group of players reportedly led by Kyrie Irving held a phone call to discuss whether returning to play—amid the COVID-19 pandemic and continued social unrest surrounding police brutality—is the best course of action. Is this a representative sample of what NBA players want to do, and will this mean we won’t see some players make the trip to Orlando when the ramp-up begins at the end of June?
Hosts: Chris Vernon and Kevin O’Connor
